overview: ELEVATOR MUSIC is an experimental sound-film about a Man who tries to attune himself to the formalities and totalities of a circuitous organization. Like the frequencies of sound that resonate and reverberate from one space to another, the Man begins his journey as the source of his own voice -- but quickly becomes entrapped within the vibrations of the WORLD as soon as he realizes the need for necessity precedes his own will.
title: Elevator Music
